      • clearAllSchemaSpecificities

        public static void clearAllSchemaSpecificities()
        Resets caches ; for test purpose.

      • registerSchemaSpecificity

        public static void registerSchemaSpecificity(Class<? extends PersistingElement> clazz,
                             String tablePostfix,
                             HBaseSchema schema)
        Provides a mean to override a schema specification for a specific table in case of a class to be persisted in a federated table. Please note that if a column family is defined using HBaseSchema, this definition is not overridden by overriding class using this method.
        Parameters:
        clazz - the class of the persisting elements
        tablePostfix - the postfix for the table for which which schema specificities should be registered ; null means no postfix
        schema - the schema specificities ; can be a DefaultHBaseSchema

      • registerSchemaSpecificity

        public static void registerSchemaSpecificity(Field field,
                             String tablePostfix,
                             HBaseSchema schema)
        Provides a mean to override a schema specification for a specific column family in case of a class to be persisted in a federated table.
        Parameters:
        field - the column family
        tablePostfix - the postfix for the table for which which schema specificities should be registered ; null means no postfix
        schema - the schema specificities ; can be a DefaultHBaseSchema
